mapper.select: select (select code_val from t_hana_code_table where code_key = name_code and code_category = 1) as name_code, account_no, name_code, balance, withdrawable_balance, limitation, dormant, lost, elec_finance_status, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regDate, to_char(recently_use_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as recentlyUseDate from T_HANA_ACCOUNT where reg_no = (select reg_no from t_hana_user where reg_no = #{regNo}) order by recentlyUseDate desc

select account_no from T_HANA_ACCOUNT where account_no = #{accountNo} and password = (SELECT standard_hash (#{password}, 'SHA256') FROM dual)
select withdrawable_balance from T_HANA_ACCOUNT where account_no = #{accountNo}
mapper.update: update T_HANA_ACCOUNT set password=(SELECT standard_hash (#{password}, 'SHA256') FROM dual) where account_no = ${accountNo}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_hana_account ( account_no, reg_no, name_code, balance, withdrawable_balance, limitation, PASSWORD, dormant, LOST, reg_date, recently_use_date, elec_finance_status, reason, property, transaction_purpose, source_of_fund ) VALUES( #{accountNo}, #{regNo}, (select code_key from t_hana_code_table where code_category = 1 and code_val = #{nameCode}), 0, 0, 1000000, (SELECT standard_hash (#{password}, 'SHA256') FROM dual), 'F', 'F', to_date(#{regDate}), to_date(#{recentlyUseDate}), 'F', (select code_key from t_hana_code_table where code_category = 5 and code_val = #{reason}), (select code_key from t_hana_code_table where code_category = 6 and code_val = #{property}), (select code_key from t_hana_code_table where code_category = 7 and code_val = #{transactionPurpose}), (select code_key from t_hana_code_table where code_category = 8 and code_val = #{sourceOfFund}) )
